4 round 24 *k1 p2 k3 p2 k4 4 times p2 k1 twice repeat from * once more round 25 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k4 4 times p2 k2 p2 k1 repeat from * once more all sizes repeat only round 25 until work measures 15 15 17 17 cm or desired length from cast on edge 7 both socks shape gusset round 1 k to 3 sts before the marker k2tog k1 slip marker heel flap work in rib pattern as set to next marker slip marker k1 ssk change to 2 5mm dpns if you are using a short circular k to marker needle there is no need to use dpns if you are using magic round 2 slip marker work in rib pattern as set to next marker loop method you may prefer to place the spare stitches from slip marker k to 3 sts before marker the top of the foot onto a stitch holder if you are using a short round 3 k2tog k1 slip marker work in rib pattern as set to next circular or dpns whilst you work the heel marker slip marker k1 ssk k to marker row 1 k2 sl1p k1 until there are 30 32 34 36 sts on your repeat rnds 2 3 to shape the gusset cont in this way decreasing needle turn 30 32 34 36 sts by two stitches at the gusset on every other round until there are row 2 sl1p p
